result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: of jury trial cancellation for trial that was scheduled for 8/26/16.

Defendant Karen A Schleiss in court with attorney Laura Ann Sutton.  Rachel Kibbe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
THIS COVERS 15CF569 & 15CF572

15CF569: Information filed for this case. Defense finds it was filed timely. Defendant pleads guilty. Court accepts the plea and finds the Defendant guilty. 
Court orders PSI. Bond continues. 

15CF572: DRI. 

Felony admonitions given.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for October 28, 2016 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Karen A Schleiss in court with attorney Laura Ann Sutton.  Angela Lynn Beranek appeared for the State of Wisconsin. THIS COVERS 15CF569 AND 15CF572. Both reset to Friday with the co-defendant.  Plea hearing scheduled for August 19, 2016 at 03:15 pm.

Plea hearing on August 15, 2016 at 02:00 pm.

Defendant Karen A Schleiss in court with attorney Laura Ann Sutton.  Angela Lynn Beranek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
15CF572 and 15CF569 called.  Reading of Informations waived.  Not guilty pleas entered to both cases.  Plea hearing scheduled for April 11, 2016 at 02:00 pm.

Clerked by DN
Defendant Karen A Schleiss in court with attorney Laura Ann Sutton for case 15CF569, 15CF572.  Defendant Kenan Schleiss in court with Attorney Les Liptak appears for 15CF570.  Rachel Kibbe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
15CF569, 15CF572, 15CF570
15CF572  2:38  Detective Randy Cook called, sworn, and direct by State.  2:45 Cross by Attorney Sutton.  2:49 Redirect by State.  2:50 Court questions witness.  2:51 Argument by State.  2:51 Argument by defense. 2:51  Court finds probable cause and binds over. 
15CF570  2:54 Motion by Attorney Liptak to strike complaint.  Argument by State.  2:56 Court denies motion.  
15CF569, 15CF570  Detective Randy Cook called and direct by State.  3:03  Cross by Attorney Liptak.   3:07 Cross by Attorney Sutton.  3:09 Court questions witness.  
3:10 Argument by State.  No argument by Defense Attorneys.  Court finds probable cause and binds defendants over.   Informations filed. Attorney Liptak and Attorney Sutton request arraignment be set at a later date.
Arraignment scheduled on all three cases before Judge Babler on 03-02-2016 at 3:45 pm.  
  Arraignment scheduled for March 2, 2016 at 03:45 pm.

THIS COVERS 15CF569, 15CF572 and 15CF570
15CF569 & 15CF572 - Defendant Karen A Schleiss in court. Rachel Kibbe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
15CF570 - Defendant Kenan J Schleiss in court. Rachel Kibbe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant's have not obtained counsel. Blue forms filed by both Defendant's. 
15CF569 & 15CF572 - Court appoints attorney Laura Sutton and orders repayment at the rate of $25/month beginning 3/1/16. 
15CF570 - Court appoints attorney Lester Liptak and orders repayment at the rate of $25/month beginning 3/1/16. 
Preliminary Hearings are reset for 2/22/16 at 4:15 PM before Judge Bitney.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for February 22, 2016 at 04:15 pm.

Defendant Karen A Schleiss in court with attorney Ryan Joseph Raymond (for today).  Defendant Karen A Schleiss in custody.  Rachel Kibbe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
THIS COVERS 15CF569 & 15CF572. Does not qualify for PD. Blue form given. Formal reading waived. Time limits waived. 
Preliminary hearings set for 1/13/16 at 1:45 PM.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for January 13, 2016 at 01:45 pm.
